definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: A continuously variable potentiometer is connected into the detector bridge network.
sentences.chinese: 在检测器桥路中，接有可调电位器。

sentences.english: RP3 on sampling signal panel is secondary sampling signal adjusted potentiometer.
sentences.chinese: 取样信号板上RP3为二次电流取样讯号调整电位器。

sentences.english: Remove protection screw from the potentiometer.
sentences.chinese: 取出电位器螺丝的保护。

sentences.english: Please widdershins turn the transmitter and the line of the volume potentiometer to the end before use.
sentences.chinese: 使用前将话筒及线路音量电位器逆时针转到底。

sentences.english: The total number of turns potentiometer the more higher the resolution.
sentences.chinese: 电位器的总匝数越多，分辨率越高。

sentences.english: The technique character of the potentiometer cover was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了电位器盖零件的工艺特点。

sentences.english: Mainly in the production of remote control, ignition coil , potentiometer-based private enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 主要以生产遥控器，高压包，电位器为主的民营企业。

sentences.english: Potentiometers are subject to certain restrictions on the installation distance.
sentences.chinese: 电位器安装距离受到一定限制。

sentences.english: The torque bar and potentiometer are key parts of the EPS.
sentences.chinese: 扭杆和电位器是转向传感器的关键部件。

sentences.english: The outputs are transformer balanced on XLR connectors and controlled by rotary master potentiometers.
sentences.chinese: 的输出变压器平衡的XLR接口和旋转主电位器控制。

definition: abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
